translations: 想像；虚构（imagine 的三单形式）

sentences.sentence: He imagines Sophia as a creative artwork and she herself can create art as well.
sentences.translation: 他把索菲亚想象成一件有创造力的艺术品，她自己也可以创造艺术。

sentences.sentence: Roth imagines lived life as fictional in the same register as a novel, in the same register as an autobiography.
sentences.translation: 罗斯想象的生活是虚构的，和小说一样，和自传一样。

sentences.sentence: He imagines giving up that terrific drive towards imagination and idealization and a return to the "rag and bone shop of the heart".
sentences.translation: 他想象着放弃那种可怕的对想象力和理想化的追求，回到“污秽的心的废品铺”。
